front.title: Unified Source Routing Instruction using MPLS Label Stack

abstract.t: MPLS-SPRING is an MPLS-based source routing paradigm in which a sender of a packet is allowed to partially or completely specify the route the packet takes through the network by imposing stacked MPLS labels to the packet. This MPLS -based source routing paradigm could actually be leveraged to realize a unified source routing instruction for both IPv4 and IPv6 underlays.
